LogStream Class Reference

This class is serves as a logging facility. More...

#include <LogStream.h>

List of all members.

Public Member Functions

virtual ~LogStream ()
 Destroys the LogStream and releases any used LogSink.

 LogStream ()
 Creates a new LogStream that logs to cerr.

 LogStream (LogSink *logSink)
 Creates a new LogStream that uses the provided LogSink. The LogStream will adopt the LogSink and delete it on destruction or change of logSink.

virtual void postMessage (LogMessage *message)
 Commits a message and then releases it.

virtual void setLogSink (LogSink *newSink)
 Switches to a new sink. Note that the provided sink should be new'ed and that LogStream will adopt it (and delete it on destruction or change of LogSink).

template<class T> LogMessage & operator<< (T t)
 Creates a new message and writes the provided object to it.


Private Attributes

LogSink * mLogSink

Detailed Description

This class is serves as a logging facility.

virtual void LogStream::setLogSink (  LogSink *  newSink  )  [inline, virtual]
 

Switches to a new sink. Note that the provided sink should be new'ed and that LogStream will adopt it (and delete it on destruction or change of LogSink).
